title: OCE League of legends Discord Server

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Hey guys I made this discord server in hopes of growing a decent sized community where you can meet & talk to people and play games with everyone, I will be doing give aways and host tournaments for league and other games in the future as the server grows.

There's lots of roles that you can earn at the moment and I'm going to be adding league specific roles that you can challenge people for on the server.
There's also music bots and more.

If you'd like to come join and help the community grow then feel free to join, everyone is welcome, we currently have about 45 members and growing, thank you for your time anyone that read this.

replies.body: Does this still exist? Trying to find a discord for OCE league

just add people from ur solo q
would help if lobbies community were bigger for public unranked but people dont like to socialise in this game and have to force themselves too creating *this* hahah
